const TYPE &  a
) 
  

00051 {
00052     // This is the other commutative case of vector*scalar.
00053     // It should be just defined to be
00054     // "return operator*(a,x);"
00055     // but some compilers (e.g. Turbo C++ v.3.0) have trouble
00056     // determining the proper template match.  For the moment,
00057     // we'll just duplicate the code in the scalar * MV_Vector 
00058     // case above.
00059 
00060       int N = x.size();
00061       MV_Vector<TYPE> result(N);
00062       for (int i=0;i<N;i++)
00063          result(i) = x(i)*a;
00064       return result;
00065 
00066 }
